Key Match Events: Mookie Betts hit a two-run homer in the sixth inning
Shohei Ohtani led off the game with a home run
Max Muncy reached base in his first four plate appearances to set a record for consecutive trips reaching safely in a single postseason
Pre-Game Insights: The Mets need to win three consecutive elimination games to advance
The team has shown resiliency throughout the season
The character of this team is built around adversity
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets now trail the series 3-1
The team will need to improve in multiple areas to win the next game
Francisco Lindor believes that beating the Dodgers in three straight games is not impossible
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers have outscored the Mets by 21 runs so far in the series
New York pitchers are walking Los Angeles hitters at an historic rate
The Mets committed four defensive errors over the series' first three games
Others: The team's looming task is not impossible, as Lindor referenced his own experience in the 2016 World Series
The Mets have a unique team dynamic and are built to make comebacks
